>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/mailserver/mailboxes/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a mailbox with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"mailbox_id":{"description":"Mailbox ID","type":"integer"},"name":{"description":"New sender name","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Updated mailbox data","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"UserId":{"type":"string","example":"UserId"},"UserDisplayName":{"type":"string","example":"UserDisplayName"},"Address":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"DomainId":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"Email":{"type":"string","example":"Email@only.com"}},"title":"ServerDomainAddressData"},"Name":{"type":"string","example":"Name"},"Aliases":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Id":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"DomainId":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"},"Email":{"type":"string","example":"Email@only.com"}},"title":"ServerDomainAddressData"}}},"title":"ServerMailboxData"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
